item.title: Anna add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
Anna add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Anna add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "He who makes a beast of himself gets rid of the pain of being a man." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: Anna add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "Like any artist without an art form, she became dangerous." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Anna add a quote by Angela Davis
item.description: "Radical simply means "grasping things at the root." -- Angela Davis

item.title: Anna add a quote by Angela Davis
item.description: "A woman of color formation might decide to work around immigration issues. This political commitment is not based on the specific histories of racialized communities or its constituent members, but rather constructs an agenda agreed upon by all who are a part of it. In my opinion, the most exciting potential of women of color formations resides in the possibility of politicizing this identity – basing the identity on politics rather than the politics on identity." -- Angela Davis

item.title: Anna add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house" -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Anna add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Anna add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I find it ridiculous to assign a gender to an inanimate object incapable of disrobing and making an occasional fool of itself. Why refer to lady crack pipe or good sir dishrag when these things could never live up to all that their sex implied?" -- David Sedaris

item.title: Anna add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Anna add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "THE EDGE, there is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Anna add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Anna add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "In a nation run by swine, all pigs are upward-mobile and the rest of us are fucked until we can put our acts together: not necessarily to win, but mainly to keep from losing completely." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Anna add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.
